languages.text: Маршал Антар встретил буйство Ардженты во всеоружии. С самого начала предполагая такое развитие событий, Соломон сумел уберечь от всесокрушающего гнева обезумевшей Сестры Битвы множество невинных жизней. Сам он лишь однажды встретился с бывшей соратницей лицом к лицу, оставшись после этого без правой руки.

Marshal Anthar faced Argenta's rage armed and ready. Having foreseen this course of events from the beginning, Solomorne was able to protect many innocent lives from the all-consuming wrath of the mad Sister of Battle. He himself only faced his former comrade in arms once. The encounter left him without his right arm.

Having foreseen this course of events all along, Solomorne was able to protect many innocent lives from the all-consuming wrath of the mad Sister of Battle. He himself only faced his former comrade in arms once. The encounter left him without his left arm.

Marshal Anthar faced Argenta's rage armed and ready. Having foreseen this course of events all along, Solomorne was able to protect many innocent lives from the all-consuming wrath of the mad Sister of Battle. He himself only faced his former comrade in arms once. The encounter left him without his left arm.

languages.text: Marschall Anthar hat sich Argentas Zorn bewaffnet und bereit gestellt. Nachdem er diese Wendung der Ereignisse von Anfang an geahnt hatte, konnte Solomorne viele unschuldige Leben vor dem alles verzehrenden Zorn der wahnsinnigen Schwester der Schlacht bewahren. Er selbst war seiner einstigen Waffenschwester nur einmal gegenüber gestanden. Dabei verlor er seinen rechten Arm.
languages.original_text: Marshal Anthar faced Argenta's rage armed and ready. Having foreseen this course of events from the beginning, Solomorne was able to protect many innocent lives from the all-consuming wrath of the mad Sister of Battle. He himself only faced his former comrade in arms once. The encounter left him without his right arm.

traits.locale_text: Marschall Anthar hat sich Argentas Zorn bewaffnet und bereit gestellt. Nachdem er diese Wendung der Ereignisse von Anfang an geahnt hatte, konnte Solomorne viele unschuldige Leben vor dem alles verzehrenden Zorn der wahnsinnigen Schwester der Schlacht bewahren. Er selbst war seiner einstigen Waffenschwester nur einmal gegenüber gestanden. Dabei verlor er seinen rechten Arm.

languages.text: L'arme au poing, le maréchal Anthar se tint prêt à faire face à la rage d'Argenta. Solomorne, qui avait prévu le déroulement des événements depuis le début, put protéger d'innombrables vies innocentes de la Sœur de Bataille déchaînée. Lui-même n'avait affronté son ancienne sœur d'arme qu'une seule fois auparavant, combat au cours duquel il avait perdu son bras droit.
languages.original_text: Marshal Anthar faced Argenta's rage armed and ready. Having foreseen this course of events from the beginning, Solomorne was able to protect many innocent lives from the all-consuming wrath of the mad Sister of Battle. He himself only faced his former comrade in arms once. The encounter left him without his right arm.

Solomorne, qui avait prévu le déroulement des événements depuis le début, put protéger d'innombrables vies innocentes de la Sœur de Bataille déchaînée. Lui-même n'avait affronté son ancienne sœur d'arme qu'une seule fois auparavant, combat au cours duquel il avait perdu son bras droit.

languages.text: 安萨元帅全副武装，亲自面对着阿洁塔的怒火。他从一开始就预见到事情会走到这一步，于是提前做好了准备，也因此拯救了许多无辜的生命，保护他们免受疯狂的战斗修女所害。这位曾经的战友，他后来只见过这一次，而这次遭遇让他失去了右臂。
languages.original_text: Marshal Anthar faced Argenta's rage armed and ready. Having foreseen this course of events from the beginning, Solomorne was able to protect many innocent lives from the all-consuming wrath of the mad Sister of Battle. He himself only faced his former comrade in arms once. The encounter left him without his right arm.

traits.locale_text: 安萨元帅全副武装，亲自面对着阿洁塔的怒火。他从一开始就预见到事情会走到这一步，于是提前做好了准备，也因此拯救了许多无辜的生命，保护他们免受疯狂的战斗修女所害。这位曾经的战友，他后来只见过这一次，而这次遭遇让他失去了右臂。

languages.text: El Mariscal Anthar hizo frente a la furia de Argenta armado y preparado. Solomorne, que había anticipado esta situación desde el principio, consiguió proteger a innumerables inocentes de la ira destructiva de la Hermana de Batalla enloquecida. Solo se enfrentó personalmente a su antigua camarada en una ocasión. Perdió el brazo derecho en la batalla.
languages.original_text: Marshal Anthar faced Argenta's rage armed and ready. Having foreseen this course of events from the beginning, Solomorne was able to protect many innocent lives from the all-consuming wrath of the mad Sister of Battle. He himself only faced his former comrade in arms once. The encounter left him without his right arm.

Solomorne, que había anticipado esta situación desde el principio, consiguió proteger a innumerables inocentes de la ira destructiva de la Hermana de Batalla enloquecida. Solo se enfrentó personalmente a su antigua camarada en una ocasión. Perdió el brazo derecho en la batalla.

languages.text: アンサール将帥は武装し、準備を整えてアルジェンタの怒りに立ち向かった。最初からこの展開を予見していたソロモーンは、狂気に満ちたシスター・オブ・バトルの激しい怒りから多くの無実の命を守ることができた。彼自身がかつての戦友と直接対峙したのは一度きりで、その戦いで左腕を失った。
languages.original_text: Marshal Anthar faced Argenta's rage armed and ready. Having foreseen this course of events all along, Solomorne was able to protect many innocent lives from the all-consuming wrath of the mad Sister of Battle. He himself only faced his former comrade in arms once. The encounter left him without his left arm.

traits.locale_text: アンサール将帥は武装し、準備を整えてアルジェンタの怒りに立ち向かった。最初からこの展開を予見していたソロモーンは、狂気に満ちたシスター・オブ・バトルの激しい怒りから多くの無実の命を守ることができた。彼自身がかつての戦友と直接対峙したのは一度きりで、その戦いで左腕を失った。

languages.text: Miralay Anthar, tepeden tırnağa kuşanıp hazır ve nazır bir şekilde Argenta'nın gazabıyla yüzleşti. Olayların bu şekilde gelişeceğini en başından beri öngören Solomorne, çılgına dönmüş Harp Rahibesi'nin her şeyi yakıp yıkan öfkesinden pek çok masum canı korumayı başardı. Eski silah arkadaşıyla karşılaşması ise tek bir seferden ibaret oldu. Bu karşılaşmanın sonucunda sağ kolunu kaybetti.
